messages.messageBody:
it's soooo quiet here so I wanted to post something different

http://www.kuronowish.com/~tomoaki/teito15.htm
if a fanfic in Japanese you can read using http://www.nifty.com/globalgate
ofcourse these fanfics can only be fully enjoyed by those who study
Japanese...

it stars Fujita Goro and Sugimura Yoshie and a cameo with Tokio
it concerns a murder at the Rokumeikan

http://fuyuzuki2.hp.infoseek.co.jp/sousaku/boji.html
is about Saitou and HIJIKATA and Tokio at Aizu...now there seems to be
a part where Hijikata is holding Tokio's hand? :: gasp :: perhaps
this is a Tokio X HIjikata...there is also mention of Takagi
Goro/Morinusuke (the younger brother of Tokio

some Tokio and Fujita Goro fanart
http://ihot.jp/album/?ui0327

it is not clear whether or not the Shinsengumi have a cameo in TV
Asahi's 2007 airing of BYAKKOTAI
http://community.livejournal.com/edo_meiji/47037.html
